Package com.mesosphere.sdk.specification

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommandSpec
    Specification for defining a command.
    ConfigFileSpecification
    Represents an optionally templated configuration file to be written before the task is started.
    ContainerSpec
    Spec for defining a Container.
    HealthCheckSpec
    HealthCheck specification.
    PlanGenerator
    PlanGenerator generates Plans from a given ServiceSpec.
    PodInstance
    A PodInstance defines a particular instance of a PodSpec.
    PodSpec
    Specification for a Pod.
    ResourceSet
    Represents a named group of resources.
    ResourceSpecification
    A ResourceSpecification encapsulates a Mesos Resource that may be used by a Task and therefore specified in a TaskSpecification.
    Service
    A Service, given a ServiceSpecification registers with Mesos and deploys, recovers, and maintains the specified Service.
    ServiceSpec
    Defines a Service.
    TaskSpec
    Specification for a Task.
    VipSpec
    Specification object for software defined VIPs.
    VolumeSpecification
    A VolumeSpecification defines the features of a Volume.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultCommandSpec
    Default implementation of CommandSpec.
    DefaultCommandSpec.Builder
    DefaultCommandSpec builder static inner class.
    DefaultConfigFileSpecification
    Basic implementation of ConfigFileSpecification which returns the provided values.
    DefaultContainerSpec
    Default implementation of ContainerSpec.
    DefaultHealthCheckSpec
    Default implementation of HealthCheckSpec.
    DefaultHealthCheckSpec.Builder
    DefaultHealthCheckSpec builder static inner class.
    DefaultPlanGenerator
    Default implementation of PlanGenerator.
    DefaultPodSpec
    Default implementation of PodSpec.
    DefaultPodSpec.Builder
    DefaultPodSpec builder static inner class.
    DefaultResourceSet
    Default implementation of ResourceSet.
    DefaultResourceSet.Builder
    DefaultResourceSet builder static inner class.
    DefaultResourceSpecification
    This class provides a default implementation of the ResourceSpecification interface.
    DefaultResourceSpecification.Builder
    DefaultResourceSpecification builder static inner class.
    DefaultService
    This class is a default implementation of the Service interface.
    DefaultServiceSpec
    Default implementation of ServiceSpec.
    DefaultServiceSpec.Builder
    DefaultServiceSpec builder static inner class.
    DefaultServiceSpec.Comparator
    Comparer which checks for equality of DefaultServiceSpecs.
    DefaultServiceSpec.Factory
    Factory which performs the inverse of Configuration.getBytes().
    DefaultTaskSpec
    Default implementation of a TaskSpec.
    DefaultTaskSpec.Builder
    DefaultTaskSpec builder static inner class.
    DefaultVipSpec
    Default implementation of VipSpec.
    DefaultVipSpec.Builder
    DefaultVipSpec builder static inner class.
    DefaultVolumeSpecification
    This class provides a default implementation of the VolumeSpecification interface.
    ReplacementFailurePolicy
    Destructive Replacement Failure Policy configuration.
    ReplacementFailurePolicy.Builder
    ReplacementFailurePolicy builder static inner class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GoalState
    The allowed goal states for a Task.
    VolumeSpecification.Type
    Types of Volumes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidTaskSpecificationException
    This class is an Exception to be used when unexpected errors are encountered in the handling of TaskSpecifications and TaskTypeSpecifications.
